title: AI Developer Intern - Spring 2026
description:
**TL;DR**

We are seeking a Full-Stack AI Developer Intern to build and experiment with Node Create's platform. The role combines technical development with client interaction. You'll hold frequent client meetings, A/B test new features and prompts, manage multiple production environments, and ship features end-to-end with AI-assisted development.

**Why Join Us?**

Node Create is a validated, Almi-financed startup entering a critical growth phase. As a Full-Stack Developer Intern, you will have the opportunity to work directly with clients, test and ship features in real-world conditions, and help shape the technical foundation of the company. This is a hands-on opportunity to apply the latest AI tools in collaboration with real users and partners. See more info about Node Create at https://nodecreate.se/

**Responsibilities**

* Conduct frequent client meetings to understand technical and product needs
* Run A/B tests on prompts, features, and design variations
* Manage these tests in Git by maintaining multiple production environments
* Ship features end-to-end, from conception to deployment, using AI-assisted development where appropriate
* Translate user and client feedback into concrete technical solutions
* Collaborate closely with the founder on product strategy and development direction
* Establish and maintain scalable development practices that support quality and speed
* Contribute to the engineering culture and set the standard for product excellence

**Requirements**

* Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, interaction design, or a related technical field
* Strong foundation in React, TypeScript, and modern web development
* Portfolio of projects demonstrating successful, user-loved products
* Ability to simplify complex user journeys into intuitive digital experiences
* Solid understanding of both engineering and design principles
* High aptitude for rapid learning, experimentation, and iteration

**Preferred Qualifications**

* Experience shipping to production, ideally with AI-assisted workflows
* Familiarity with Git workflows for managing multiple environments
* Experience in designing or building AI-driven products

**Benefits & Structure**

* Salary of 8,500 SEK per month
* Wellness reimbursement (friskvård)
* Participation in a generous bonus program
* Internship conducted on a remote basis
* While the probability of a long-term employment opportunity after the internship is limited, there is potential for future partnership opportunities, including equity participation for successful interns
* Opportunity to join during a pivotal growth phase and gain substantial hands-on experience in AI-driven product development
* High degree of independence, adaptability, and ownership expected

Jobbtyp: Praktik

Lön: 8 000,00kr - 9 000,00kr per månad

Förmåner:

* Friskvårdsbidrag
* Jobba hemifrån

Ansökningsfrågor:

* What is the most impressive thing you've done? \*
* Why do you want to join Node Create specifically? \*

Arbetsort: Distans

title: FME-utvecklare till Sweco
description:
**FME-utvecklare till Sweco**
=============================

*Är du intresserad av hållbarhet och samhällsutveckling? Är du redo för nästa utmaning? Vi växer och söker fler engagerade och tekniknördiga FME-utvecklare!*

**Vilka är vi?**  

Vi är ett härligt gäng på drygt 40 personer med hög teknisk kompetens som brinner för innovativa lösningar. Vi är lokaliserade i Skåne, Blekinge och Halland med kontor i bland annat Malmö, Helsingborg, Halmstad och Karlskrona. Hos oss finns utvecklare, geodataexperter, BIM-specialister, GIS-utvecklare, FME-experter och IT-projektledare. Tillsammans med våra 300 kollegor runt om i Sverige utgör vi Digital Services, som är en del av Sweco.

**Din framtida roll**  

Som FME-utvecklare hos oss kommer du att arbeta med spännande kunduppdrag där FME spelar en central roll i att hjälpa våra kunder att optimera sina verksamheter. Du kommer att ingå i team med oerhört kompetenta kollegor och samarbeta nära våra kunder för att skapa effektiva och kvalitetssäkrade dataflöden. Med hjälp av FME hjälper vi även kunderna att bearbeta information, genomföra avancerade analyser på stora datamängder, automatisera processer samt visualisera och dela data till olika intressenter. Vi arbetar ofta med relationsdatabaser med spatiala tillägg som PostGIS, Oracle Spatial och SQL Server, och kombinerar programmering med FME för att leverera skräddarsydda lösningar. Vi nyttjar även bland annat Geoserver, QGIS och ArcGIS i våra uppdrag. Vårt nära samarbete med kunderna säkerställer att vi alltid levererar lösningar som är i linje med deras specifika behov och önskemål.


Tjänsten är förlagd på heltid med utgångspunkt från något av våra kontor inom regionen.

**Den vi söker – är det du?**  

Vi tror att du vill bidra till ett hållbart samhälle genom digitalisering och har ett brinnande intresse för FME-utveckling, geodata och databaser. Dataanalys och systemutveckling intresserar dig och i ditt arbetssätt är du kommunikativ, strukturerad och innovativ. Du delar gärna din kunskap och vill hjälpa Sweco att leverera hållbara digitala lösningar i teknisk framkant. Vi värdesätter att du är nyfiken, ansvarstagande och engagerad, egenskaper som är viktiga i din roll som konsult hos oss på Sweco.

**Dina erfarenheter**  

Vi söker dig som har en högskole- eller universitetsexamen samt minst fyra års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet. Du besitter kompetens inom följande områden:

* FME
* Spatiala databaser (SQL Server, PostGIS eller Oracle)
* Python


Vi ser det som meriterande om du har erfarenhet inom några av följande områden:

* ArcGIS Enterprise
* QGIS
* Origo eller Hajk
* Open layers
* GeoServer
* Data management
* CityGML
* Visualisering, 3D data
* Andra programmeringsspråk
* Fjärranalys
* Rasterdata, Lidardata
* Machine Learning, AI
* Azure
* Unreal Engine


Du uttrycker dig väl på både svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.

**Varför jobba hos oss?**  

Sweco är en av Sveriges mest attraktiva arbetsgivare. Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i en miljö som kännetecknas av omväxling på alla plan, med problemlösning i fokus. Vi är en flexibel arbetsplats för att du ska kunna styra dina dagar i största möjliga mån, genom ansvar och stor frihet. Vår kultur präglas av öppenhet, starkt driv, tillit, samverkan och en stor dos prestigelöshet. Vi tycker om att jobba tillsammans och att dela med oss av vår kompetens, så att vi hela tiden lär oss av varandra. Vi har helt enkelt väldigt roligt på jobbet!

**Ledarskapet**  

På Sweco värnar vi om ett hållbart arbetsliv och ett gott ledarskap som stöttar dig i ditt arbete och i din fortsatta utveckling. Ledarskapet på Sweco kännetecknas av ett genuint engagemang för att vi tillsammans ska kunna leverera till våra kunder och samtidigt utvecklas inom våra kompetenser och ha roligt tillsammans.

**Ansökan**  

Annonsen kommer att ligga ute till och med 30/9 och intervjuer sker löpande. Vid tillsatt tjänst kan annonsen tas ner i förtid. Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mejl, utan hänvisar till ansökningsformuläret nedan. Vi återkopplar till samtliga sökande efter avslutad rekryteringsprocess.

**Kontakta oss**  

Vill du höra mer om tjänsten och hur vi jobbar i gruppen? Välkommen att kontakta oss:


Emmy Axelsson, Gruppchef Sweco Digital Services Syd emmy.axelsson@sweco.se


Isabelle Gröndal, Gruppchef Sweco Digital Services Syd isabelle.grondal@sweco.se


Niklas Juntikka, Gruppchef Sweco Digital Service Syd niklas.juntikka@sweco.se

**Vill du vara med och forma framtiden?**  

**Då ser vi fram emot din ansökan!**

  

På Sweco vill vi vara en arbetsplats präglad av mångfald. Vi tror att fler perspektiv breddar vår förmåga att fortsätta nå våra mål och eftersträvar mångfald i våra rekryteringsprocesser.
  

  

Sweco planerar och utformar morgondagens hållbara samhällen och städer. Med den samlade kunskapen hos våra 22 000 arkitekter, ingenjörer och andra experter arbetar vi tillsammans med våra kunder för att möjliggöra den gröna omställningen, maximera digitaliseringens potential och stärka samhällets motståndskraft. Sweco är Europas ledande konsultföretag inom arkitektur och teknik med en omsättning på cirka 31 miljarder SEK under 2024. Företaget är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm. www.swecogroup.com.
company_description: Sweco planerar och utformar framtidens samhällen och städer.

title: .NET Fullstack Developer
description:
**Ready for something different? Are you a passionate developer looking for the next challenge in your career? If you would like to combine the benefits of working as a consultant with the benefits of working in a product company, we at Piktiv would like to hear from you!**

##### **Who We Are**


We are a progressive consultancy company that provides smart solutions for our clients. Our work spans from heavy industry systems, healthcare applications, retail and fintech systems, to computer games. We pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and our ability to turn complex challenges into streamlined solutions.


In contrast to many other consultancy companies, Piktiv brings in client projects to work on in-house by providing highly skilled fullstack teams instead of individual consultants. At the moment we are looking to add one more team member to one of our existing clients — a company revolutionising the retail industry by facilitating real-time data sharing between brands and independent retailers.

##### **Who You Are**


You have built a solid foundation in software development through several years of hands-on experience. Your problem-solving approach balances creativity and practicality, ensuring the solutions you develop are both efficient and maintainable. You communicate effectively, making complex technical concepts more accessible to colleagues and stakeholders, which helps drive collaboration and shared understanding.


You take ownership of your work, continuously improving your skills and refining your approach to development. You are eager to grow into a more senior role by deepening your technical expertise and broadening your impact within the team.

##### **What you will do**


Working at Piktiv means being part of a cross functional team consisting of you and your Piktiv colleagues. Together you will tackle the tricky challenges that our clients face.

*Responsibilities*:

* Be involved in every step of the development process, from requirements gathering, design, and implementation to testing, deployment, and operations.
* Actively participate in the development and improvement of our software solutions, bringing your skills and ideas to help shape the project’s progress.
* Work closely with your team members, sharing knowledge and learning from each other. Through collaboration, you contribute to a supportive and skilled development team.

##### **Qualifications**

* At least 4 years of experience working as a software developer out of which 2 years are in .NET and C#
* Strong communication skills in English, both written and verbal
* Willingness to learn and grow as a software developer

##### **Desirable skills**

* Experience with React
* Familiarity with Microsoft Azure

##### **What We Offer**


At Piktiv, we believe in the importance of open communication and creating a collaborative workplace where each individual can thrive. We work hard to cultivate a culture of support and learning with an emphasis on a healthy work-life balance. We offer a competitive salary as well as several perks and benefits. Rather than offer a standardized plan across the company, we like to tailor our offer to your personal preferences in person. The position is full-time, 40 hours per week, on-site in our Skövde office.


  
Department
Software Development Services
Locations
Skövde

title: Software Developer, Fighter Radar Developement
description:
*Want to influence the bigger picture? At Saab, you can realise amazing innovations that keep people and societies safe. Together, we can truly make an impact – and your part matters.*


We are currently looking for software developers who would like to join one of our advanced radar software development teams, responsible for developing state-of-the-art radar application software. With us, you will have a career that constantly stretches your capabilities and offers you an opportunity to work with the technologies of the future.


Your role


Join the Fighter Radar organisation as a software developer and take on an important role in one of our growing software development teams! The teams are responsible for the development and maintenance of radar application software, providing you with the opportunity to influence both product characteristics and our operational practices.


The development teams are responsible for:

* Breaking down and refining requirements
* Designing and implementing software solutions
* Integrating, testing, and verifying the software developed by the team
* Collaborating with colleagues from various parts of Saab, such as system design, system integration and verification, quality assurance, product management, and project management
* Driving efficient software development practices
* Utilising agile methodologies (sprint planning, daily stand-ups, etc.)
* Actively contributing to product roadmap definitions


Your profile


We are looking for a dedicated and self-motivated individual who enjoys programming and has a strong sense of ownership. You should be able to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment, and have strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and excellent communication abilities.


Desired experiences include:

* A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is required, along with a genuine interest in software development and complex products.
* Software development practices, including version handling and CI/CD
* Proficiency in Linux
* Experience with high-performance computing
* Programming in C++


Advantageous competencies include:

* Version control systems
* CI/CD tools
* Real-time systems
* Communication protocols
* Radar technology
* Signal processing


This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.


What you will be a part of


Explore a wealth of possibilities. Take on challenges, create smart inventions, and grow beyond. This is a place for curious minds, brave pioneers, and everyone in between. Together, we achieve the extraordinary, each bringing our unique perspectives. Your part matters.


Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 26,000 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.


Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here


If you are interested in what benefits you can take part of as an employee at Saab in Sweden, you can read more about them here
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: Product Developer to New Development (1 year temporary position)
description:
**Job Description** *We are looking for a Product Developer Accessories & FBB with a strategic mindset, a passion for fashion, and a collaborative spirit to join our Guest Design & Collabs team at New Development, H&M.*

 **WHAT YOU’LL DO**  

As a Product Developer in Guest Design & Collabs, you’ll be at the heart of some of H&M’s most exciting and influential projects. This role gives you the unique opportunity to work with renowned guest designers and creative teams, shaping collections that capture global attention and set new standards for fashion innovation. We are looking for a product developer who wants to be part of a team that is driven, inspires and contributes to work towards our brand building goals.


In this position you will focus on developing accessories, shoes and bags. You’ll lead the component & development process—from the first spark of an idea to the final product—ensuring every detail reflects our commitment to quality, sustainability, and creativity. In this fast-paced, collaborative environment, your vision and expertise will help turn bold concepts into reality, making a real impact on our brand and our customers.

* Drive the component and product development process with a strategic and customer-centric approach
* Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to bring visionary collections to life
* Lead pre-season planning and in-season execution, taking full ownership of development timelines and activity plans to ensure price, quality and sustainability targets are met.
* Identify and fill gaps in the component library—both digital and physical—aligning with brand direction and project needs, while actively supporting knowledge sharing across teams and in the accessory department.
* Take ownership of sourcing, material selection, and sample handling
* Foster strong relationships with production offices, suppliers, and vendors
* Support, guide and coordinate design consultants for each collab and project
* Track KPIs and reflect on outcomes to continuously improve development processes

 **WHO YOU ARE**

To succeed in this role, we believe you have:

* A degree in textiles, product development, or a related field
* +5 years of relevant experience, within accessories, shoes and bags. High fashion and premium background are merited
* Strong technical and quality knowledge, with clear insight into how making processes affect product outcomes.
* A deep understanding of the product development process and production capabilities
* A strategic and proactive mindset with strong planning and organizational skills
* A passion for fashion, innovation, and sustainability
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* A flexible, solution-oriented approach and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
* Strong salesmanship and entrepreneurial mindset

 **WHO WE ARE**

H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.


We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.


The New Development department’s mission is to strengthen our brand’s fashion credibility by creating industry-leading products, collaborations, and new business developments. Our Brand Building collections aim to deliver the most desirable and sustainable products, combining cutting-edge fashion with creativity. When we launch something, the world stops for a moment. New Development is a fast-paced, collaborative environment where innovation and constant improvement are at the core of everything we do.

 **JOIN US**

Additional information:  

This is a temporary position starting in December, with placement in Stockholm. If you feel your experience, skills and ambitions are right for this role, please send your application including CV as soon as possible. Interviews will be held continuously. (For internal applicants, please remember to initiate a dialogue with your manager before applying).


Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.  



Benefits:  

At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP.


Inclusion & Diversity:  

H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organization. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.


We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.

 **Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.**
company_description: At H&M, we welcome you to be yourself and challenge you to grow and make a difference. Help us reimagine the future of an entire industry, making everyone look, feel & do good.

title: Backend Developer
description:
At Tata Technologies we make product development dreams a reality by designing, engineering and validating the products of tomorrow for the world’s leading manufacturers. Due to our continued growth, we are now recruiting for a Backend Developer to be based at our customer site in Södertälje, Stockholm.
  
  

**The role:**  

* Develop application for our Slurm front end solution for simulation clusters (HPC).
* Python developer: 8–10 years preferred; minimum 4-5 years required.
* Mature DevOps experience: CI/CD, automated testing, and monitoring/observability.
* Background in large companies and teams; able to mentor and improve ways of working. This is a developer assignment. Core should be coding ability.


Where will the assignment be performed (Onsite, Hybrid, offsite)
  
Hybrid. 2 Days/week at office
  
Education
  
Data science or physics min bachelor of science
  
Language - Phyton
  
  

**Meriting:**  

* Working with HPC and Slurm, License management, it’s a big plus!
* Working with Linux and Slurm applications is also Meritus.


If you are passionate about bringing innovation to the projects you work on then we would love to hear from you.
  
**Tata Technologies:** Engineering a better world.
  
Tata Technologies would like to thank all applicants for their interest; each application will be reviewed against the set criteria for the role. We would like to advise that only candidates under consideration will be contacted. If you do not hear from us within 10 working days following the closing date it will mean that unfortunately your application has not been successful. We will however retain your details for any suitable future opportunities.

title: Integration Developer (Java) in Stockholm
description:
Om tjänsten
  
We are looking for an Integration Developer with an interest in growing into a Team Lead role. The position is based in Solna and involves working with complex integrations that support the entire organization. You will be part of a large team with high technical expertise, where the culture is characterized by collaboration, openness, and a strong drive to deliver business value through technical solutions.
  
  

This is a consultancy assignment where you will initially be employed by Maxitech and work on-site with our client. After approximately 12 months, there is a mutual expectation for you to transition into a permanent role with the client.
  
  

Du erbjuds
  
  

* The opportunity to work in one of Sweden’s most complex integration environments
* Excellent opportunities for personal growth with a clear path toward a leadership role
* Attractive benefits, modern offices, and a culture that values teamwork and helpfulness
* A generous competence development budget to accelerate your learning and career growth


Maxitech’s unique recruitment model
  
At Maxitech, you are offered more than just a regular employment. During your time with us, we ensure that you can expand your skills through both the client’s projects and Maxitech’s network. You will also benefit from a dedicated competence budget that allows you to sharpen your skills and reach new heights
  
  

Arbetsuppgifter
  
As an Integration Developer, you will work on projects focused on system integrations across the organization. The role includes:
  
* Participation in both internal and external projects, ranging from short assignments to long-term engagements.
* Gradually taking on Team Lead responsibilities, with focus on technical leadership and coordination.
* Close collaboration with stakeholders to understand business needs and deliver value.
* Configuration, technical guidance, and occasional development in Java to support integration solutions.


Din profil
  
  

**Requirements:**  

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent
* 3–5 years of Java development experience (preferably in integration development).
* Strong skills in Java/Spring Boot Microservices.
* 2-4 years of hands-on experience with API Management and/or Apache Kafka
* Hands-on experience with PostgreSQL.
* Familiarity with Linux and WSL environments.
* Fluent in English (Swedish is an advantage)


**Meritorious:**  

* Proficiency in GitHub Actions and Ansible Tower for automation.
* Hands-on experience with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) with a strong understanding of Kubernetes clusters.
* Knowledge of Splunk, Fluent Bit, Helm charts, DevOps practices and working with Azure environments.
* Experience with Angular, JavaScript, and Bash scripting.
* Previous experience in integration development in complex environments.
* Agile Mindset
* Experience with JIRA and Confluence


You are humble, social, and service-minded. You enjoy working in an environment where people support each other, give and receive feedback, and where technology is seen as a tool for creating real business value. Strong communication skills are essential as the role involves regular interaction with clients.
  
  

Övrigt
  
Other information
  
* Location: Stockholm, Solna
* Start date: As soon as possible
* Scope: Full-time
* Other: Background checks will be carried out before employment


Om oss
  
Maxitech is an IT/Tech consultancy company working with some of the industry’s sharpest consultants. We also provide direct recruitment solutions for our clients, tailoring our services to meet their specific needs.

title: Developer Support Specialist
description:
*At Configura, we believe that well-designed spaces have a profound impact on individuals, organizations, and the planet. Our purpose is to help create spaces where people and businesses can thrive, perform, and grow. Our vision is to be the world's most intelligent platform for designing sustainable, efficient, and beautiful spaces. Together with our community, we push the boundaries of what's possible in space design.*


Are you passionate about technology, problem-solving, and helping others succeed? We are looking for a **Developer Support Specialist** to join our Developer Experience team and play a key role in ensuring an exceptional customer and developer experience within CET and CET Developer ecosystem.

 **About the position**


As a Developer Support Specialist, you will provide professional, friendly, and solution-oriented support to both users and developers. You will not only handle advanced questions and troubleshoot challenges, but also contribute to building knowledge, engagement, and community around our products.

**Your responsibilities will include:**

* Exploring and developing expertise in the CET and CET Developer ecosystem.
* Delivering professional, insightful, and solution-focused support through the right channels.
* Staying up to date with product developments and ensuring accurate knowledge sharing.
* Assisting in training events such as CET Experience and Developer Conference.
* Logging, following up, and resolving support tickets effectively.
* Suggesting improvements, shortcuts, and tools to simplify user workflows.
* Acting as a liaison between users/developers and the Configura team to ensure their needs are represented.
* Collaborating with documentation teams to build a reliable knowledge base.

**Who we are looking for**


We believe you are someone who is:

* **An excellent communicator** – fluent in English, both spoken and written.
* **Curious and creative** – eager to find solutions and think outside the box when needed.
* **Empathetic and professional** – friendly, polite, and always customer-focused.
* **Independent and reliable** – able to take ownership and work with structure.
* **Proactive** – quick to take initiative and contribute ideas for improvement.

 **You have:**

* Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or equivalent experience.
* At least 1 year experience from a similar position.
* Strong skills in languages such as Java, C# and C++.
* If you have previous experience in CM, Configuras own programming language, that is preferred but not a requirement.

 **What we offer**

* The opportunity to grow into an expert within the CET and CET Developer ecosystem.
* A dynamic, international, and supportive team culture.
* A workplace where support is seen as a core part of customer success.
* The chance to participate in exciting industry events and training opportunities.

 **About the Company**  

Configura is headquartered in Linköping (Sweden) with with five wholly-owned subsidiaries in Grand Rapids (Michigan, USA), Cincinnati (Ohio, USA), Kuala Lumpur (Malaysia), Berlin (Germany), and Tokyo (Japan). At Configura, we are team players who always help each other! Our atmosphere is very friendly with committed Configurans who strive towards our goals together. We love problem solving and to find innovative solutions.

title: Senior Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 4 års erfarenhet
* God kunskap om och god erfarenhet av Exstream.
* God kunskap om modulen Storyteller.
* God kunskap om bildhantering: Manipulering och konvertering via script.
* God kunskap om och god erfarenhet av att jobba med automatiserade tester.
* God förmåga att uttrycka sig på svenska i tal och skrift.

  

**Meriterande**

title: Javautvecklare
description:
**This is Everone**


Vi är en agentur för duktiga och ambitiösa systemutvecklare. Våra utvecklare arbetar i **backend**, **fullstack**, **frontend** och med **design**. Med moderna plattformar och ny teknik bygger våra utvecklare digitala lösningar och innovationer för framtiden hos våra kunder.

 **Javautvecklare**


Till vår kund söker vi nu en javautvecklare för en längre konsultuppdrag. Vår kund ansvarar för att utveckla och förvalta digitala lösningar som säkerställer en attraktiv, hållbar och pålitlig kollektivtrafik för hela regionen. Inom leveransområdet arbetar cirka 60 personer i flera agila team. Produktområdet består av två team som utvecklar och förvaltar tjänster för försäljning, betalning, kundtjänststöd samt integrationer mot externa digitala återförsäljare enligt nationella standarder.


Teamen arbetar i tvåveckorssprintar med kontinuerliga releaser. Tjänsterna byggs som molnlösningar i AWS, huvudsakligen i Java med Spring och Docker, i en automatiserad bygg- och deploymentmiljö via Jenkins. Miljön är distribuerad och eventbaserad, med högt fokus på robusthet, säkerhet, skalbarhet och användarvänlighet.

### **Uppdraget**


Som utvecklare i Biljettplattformen kommer du att:


Bygga och vidareutveckla backend-tjänster för biljettförsäljning och betalningar.


Arbeta med integrationer mot ombud och externa digitala återförsäljare.


Delta i utveckling och drift av molntjänster i AWS.


Bidra i ett agilt team som arbetar med kontinuerliga releaser och automatiserad deployment.


Säkerställa kvalitet, robusthet och säkerhet i levererade tjänster.


Arbetet omfattar även beredskapstjänstgöring. Ersättning för beredskap och eventuell övertid regleras enligt kundens riktlinjer.

### **Kravprofil**

### **Obligatoriska krav**

### 

Högskoleutbildning, eller högre, inom datateknik eller liknande ELLER minst 8 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling.
  

  

Minst 5 års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling.
  

  

Minst 3 års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling med Java 11 eller senare.
  

  

Minst 2 års erfarenhet av att bygga upp, drifta och utveckla i AWS under de senaste 5 åren.
  

  

Minst 2 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta i automatiserade CI/CD-miljöer (t.ex. Ansible, Jenkins, CircleCI, GitLab Pipelines).
  

  

Minst 1 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med containers (t.ex. Docker).

### **Mervärdeskrav**

Erfarenhet av eventbaserade/distribuerade system under minst ett uppdrag.


Minst 1 års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av Spring och/eller Spring Boot.


Erfarenhet av funktionell och modern Java-programmering under minst ett uppdrag.


Erfarenhet av att arbeta med databaser under minst ett uppdrag.

### **Personliga egenskaper**

Kommunikativ och lösningsfokuserad.


Analytisk och engagerad.


Villig att utveckla sig själv och lära nytt.


Självgående och ansvarstagande.


Lagspelare som bidrar till teamets gemensamma mål.

### **Start och längd**

**Start:** 27 oktober 2025

**Slut:** 26 oktober 2026 med möjlighet till förlängning

**Omfattning:** Heltid, 40 timmar/vecka

  


  

**Placering**


Rollen är en konsultanställning på Everone men placering hos vår kund på Kungsholmen i Stockholm med möjlighet till viss möjlighet till distans i samråd med kunden.

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

We are looking for a Fullstack Developer with a strong focus on frontend development  

  

* Drive the development of modern, user-friendly interfaces with React, applying best practices, design principles, and architectural patterns.
* Take responsibility for ensuring secure, maintainable, and scalable solutions, with a primary emphasis on frontend but also with an understanding of backend and DevOps.
* Collaborate closely with the product team to identify improvements, propose solutions, and actively contribute to the evolution of the product.
* Support the group’s growth by sharing knowledge, engaging in discussions, and fostering best practices across the team.

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* Solid experience in React (JavaScript/TypeScript) and modern frontend development.
* Strong knowledge of best practices, design patterns, and UI/UX design principles.
* Understanding of backend technologies (NodeJS) and DevOps practices (Configuring pipelines, and suggest services to use).
* Awareness of security best practices, particularly from a frontend perspective.

  

**Meritorious**  

* Experience with 3D rendering or visualization.
* Familiarity with digital twin concepts, advanced analytics, or machine learning integration.
 **Application deadline:**05-10-2025

  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Node Developer
description:
**Who we are**  

At Anyfin, we believe finance should empower people – not weigh them down. Since 2017, we’ve helped thousands across Sweden, Finland, Germany and Norway regain control over their finances by refinancing expensive consumer credit and saving millions in the process. But this is just the beginning. With new products and markets on the horizon, we’re on an ambitious journey to make financial well-being a reality for millions more.


Our team values growth, diversity, and adaptability, and you’ll have the chance to contribute to impactful projects from your very first day.

**What you will be doing**


Now we’re looking for a **Senior Node.js Developer** to join our engineering team in Stockholm. This is a role for someone who wants to take ownership, solve complex backend challenges, and contribute directly to the future of our financial platforms.

* Build, optimize and scale robust financial backend systems using Node.js and SQL (Postgres).
  
* Work primarily in the backend, but also touch on TypeScript, GraphQL and occasionally React.
  
* Tackle complex coding problems, design new solutions, and refine existing systems.
  
* Contribute to system architecture, ensuring scalability and reliability of our financial systems.
  
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to shape both product and business strategy.
* Share your backend expertise with the team, championing best practices and continuous learning.

**Our Engineering Culture**


We’re a team that loves building things that work, and having a good time while doing it. Think fewer egos, more collaboration and more smart solutions. We care about clean code, solid systems, and the kind of teamwork that makes work feel a lot less like work. Our engineers don’t just write code, they know how to move the business forward with it.


Collaboration > competition: The best ideas usually come from a mix of perspectives, so we share knowledge and enjoy the process of getting to the best possible solution.


Own it like you mean it: If you see something that needs fixing, building, or reimagining: you don’t just have permission, you are expected have the encouragement to dive in. We know how to prioritize engineering for business results.


Fast > perfect (but not rushed): Shipping is our love language. We believe quality and speed go hand in hand.


Craft counts: We care about clean code, reliable systems, and making future-us grateful for today-us. We take pride in our work.


Human first: Work is important, but so is enjoying the ride. Expect team banter, inside jokes, and the occasional competition over Table Tennis, Counterstrike, Tekken or Mario Kart.

**About you**

* Strong background in backend development with Node.js and SQL databases (preferably Postgres).
  
* At least 5 years of professional experience, ideally in high-stakes environments like finance.
  
* Passionate about solving complex backend problems with clean, pragmatic solutions.
  
* Solid understanding of system design and architecture.
  
* Bonus if you’ve worked with React, Python, Go, GraphQL, Kubernetes, Google Cloud, or DevOps with Github Actions – but your backend expertise is what matters most.

**What we offer**  

At Anyfin, you’ll join a diverse team of ambitious, kind people who care about doing things better – for our customers and for each other. We work at a high pace, with a flat structure and zero prestige. Your work will make a difference in our customers' lives.


We offer competitive compensation, great benefits, and a centrally located office in Stockholm. You’ll also get extra time off on your birthday and a few other perks we’ll tell you about when we meet. Most importantly, you’ll join a collaborative team where innovation thrives in person, which is why we spend four days a week together at the office.


We’re backed by some of the best investors in Europe and have already built products that make a real impact, but we’re just getting started.


If you’re ready to help us transform the financial well-being of millions, we can’t wait to meet you.

**We can’t wait to meet you!**
company_description: We're the rebels of the financial industry, putting an end to overpriced financial products. We push the envelope of fintech and financial health!

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Help us redefine what it means to be a financial partner for everyday heroes**


**Sambla Group is a fintech company with a clear goal – to make personal finance better for all. We need you, your ambition and your skills on our journey. We have become the fast-growing fintech company that we are today - bridging the gap between borrowers and lenders - thanks to all the 400+ amazing people who work here.**

**With the vision to become a trusted personal finance partner, our success is the result of the commitment to deliver the best customer journey and consumer finance products in the industry. Through our well known brands such as Sambla, Advisa, Rahalaitos, Omalaina, Rahoitu and DigiFinans we support customers in consolidating and getting the best terms on their loans.**


**Right now** **we are looking for frontend engineers** who want to be part of this journey, who care about impact, not just output. With a product mindset, you will help shape the next phase of our growth.

### **What you will do**

* Build intuitive, performant, and customer-first interfaces with React (TS/JS).
  
* Collaborate closely with design, backend, and business colleagues to deliver seamless experiences.
  
* Contribute to product discovery and influence technical choices.
  
* Write clean, reliable code and take ownership from idea to production.
  
* Help evolve our frontend practices and processes as we grow.
  

### **What we are looking for**

* 5+ years of frontend or fullstack experience with frequent product shipping
  
* Strong skills in React and modern TypeScript/JavaScript
  
* Experience with or curiosity for our stack: Node.js, React, TypeScript/JavaScript, Next.js, and AWS (including CDK and CloudFormation)
* Solid experience building frontend systems that balance usability with performance, maintainability, and scalability.
  
* Bonus: React Native, app-first mindset, AI-driven workflows.
  
* Above all: a product mindset, you want to understand why we build things and you see impact as important as delivery.

### **Why this role?**

* **Shape the experience:** Play a key role in how customers interact with our products and bring design ideas to life.
* **Build for impact:** Create intuitive and accessible interfaces that thousands of people rely on every day.
* **Grow and explore:** Join at a stage where team missions and ventures expand, giving you the chance to explore different problem spaces over time.
* **Work with purpose**: What you design and build directly empowers everyday people to take control of their finances and improve their lives.

### **What we offer**

* **Business in mind & people at heart** – we deliver results together and celebrate achievements.
* A varied and challenging role in a multinational and highly innovative company, where we value the development of our employees.
* A workplace where people genuinely **enjoy coming to work**.
* A friendly culture with openness and respect for one another, with the possibility to influence and make a difference on society and people’s everyday lives.

### **Please note**


As part of our efforts to foster an unbiased recruitment process, we kindly encourage you not to include picture, gender, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation or age in your CV.

title: Hungrig och bred utvecklare till Webcur
description:
### **Vi är på en spännande tysklandsresa inom e-hälsa och behöver förstärka vårt team med en utvecklare som delar vår vision om en vård fri från onödig administration.**


Utvecklingen av Webcur påbörjades våren 2021 och har som mål att bli ett komplett journalsystem för den tyska marknaden.

### **Om rollen**


Du behöver inte vara hungrig bara för att vi bjuder på frukost varje fredag och du behöver inte vara bred för att vi har mycket plats på kontoret. Du behöver vara hungrig på fortsatt kunskap och bred i både intresseområde och erfarenheter. Som utvecklare i ett av våra tvärfunktionella team kommer du att arbeta med vårt webbaserade journalsystem **Webcur**. Produkten är byggd med **Kotlin Spring Boot i backend** och **React/TypeScript i frontend** och driftas på en **containerbaserad molnplattform**. Patientsäkerhet är central i vår produkt och det är viktigt att du värdesätter höga krav på kvalitet och driftsäkerhet.


Vi ser stora fördelar med **tvärfunktionellt samarbete, kundfokus, snabba flöden, korta återkopplingscykler och iterativa utvecklingsmetoder**. Söker dig som trivs med att arbeta tillsammans med andra och som vill jobba med CI/CD.


Vi värdesätter högt om du som utvecklare **vill vara aktiv och ta ansvar i produktutforskarfasen och bidra till att förstå kundens behov och affärsdomänen**.

### **Din profil**


Du har **några års arbetslivserfarenhet som utvecklare**. Gärna med erfarenhet av utveckling i större system. Vi gillar om du drivs av **nyfikenhet och en vilja att lära**.

#### **Erfarenheter som uppskattas:**


Erfarenhet av **Kotlin/Java** och/eller**React/TypeScript**  

Erfarenhet av **Databaser / SQL**  

Vana att **testa din kod**  

Erfarenhet av och intresse för **agila värderingar, principer och arbetssätt**  

Språkkunskaper i **engelska/svenska**

#### **Bonus om erfarenhet av:**


Erfarenhet av **medicintekniska system eller sjukvård**  

Erfarenhet av **samarbetsinriktad utveckling (Pair Programming/Software Teaming)**  

**Testdriven utveckling (TDD)**  

**Continuous Integration & Delivery** (Trunk-based Development)  

Kunskaper i **tyska**

### **Vi erbjuder**


Hos oss står **välmående i fokus**, och vi erbjuder förmåner såsom:  

**Träning på arbetstid**  

**Friskvårdsbidrag och sjukvårdsförsäkring**  

**Personalaktiviteter**  

**"Innovation days" (utvecklingsdagar)**


Carasent erbjuder en **hybrid arbetsplats** med minst 2 kontorsdagar, vilket ger dig flexibilitet i hur du fördelar din arbetstid. Vi ser dock gärna att alla kollegor träffas regelbundet på kontoret.

### **Om Carasent**


Carasent är **förankrat i visionen om att möjliggöra framtidens vård**. Vi erbjuder vårdgivare **ett sömlöst ekosystem av integrerade lösningar** som avsevärt **minskar administrativa bördor och förbättrar patientengagemang och vårdleverans**.


Med en bred produktportfölj, inklusive **molnbaserade journalsystem, digitala patientkommunikationstjänster, BI-lösningar och integrationer med partners**, erbjuder Carasent idag **den mest flexibla affärsstödet för klinisk verksamhet i Norden**.


Carasent har kontor i **Sverige, Tyskland och Norge** och har kunder inom **primärvård, specialistvård, företagshälsovård och rehabilitering**, framför allt inom den privata sektorn.

### **Ansökan och bakgrundskontroll**


Innan en anställning kan bli aktuell kommer en **bakgrundskontroll att genomföras**. Vi använder bakgrundskontroller från **SRI**.


**För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta rekryterande chef:** joakim.bring@carasent.com

### **Nyfiken? Skicka in din ansökan!**


**Vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan på svenska eller engelska!**  

Vi tillämpar **löpande urval**, och annonsen är öppen tills tjänsten är tillsatt.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer – Build the Future of Mobility with Aimo IT
description:
**By continuing to think innovatively and always putting people’s needs first, we believe we can make a real difference. As the leading mobility partner in the Nordic region, we are constantly developing new solutions that make everyday life simpler and more sustainable. We are Aimo.**

**About the job**
-----------------


As a Senior Fullstack Developer at Aimo IT, you’ll work hands-on across the stack while guiding your team to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions. You’ll be trusted to take ownership of both technical execution and leadership, driving structure and progress in a hybrid team setup.

* Build and maintain end-to-end solutions – from customer-facing features to backend services.
* Participate daily standups, support prioritization, and secure delivery pace.
* Partner with solution architects, QA, and other developers to ensure best practices across teams.
* Balance hands-on coding with leadership responsibilities, influencing architecture and delivery methods.
* Play a central role in reducing consultant dependency and building stronger internal capabilities.

**About you**
-------------


You are an experienced developer – ready to step into the role. What drives you is not just writing code, but problemsolving, creating clarity, enabling others, and shaping long-term solutions that matter.

* Strong fullstack experience (React, Node.js, TypeScript/JavaScript, APIs, databases).
* Ability to work with cross-functional teams, be a driver in technical discussions, and influence architecture decisions.
* Solid understanding of CI/CD pipelines and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
* Pragmatic mindset: balancing speed, scalability, and quality.
* Strong collaborator: sharing knowledge and mentoring others.
* Bonus: Atlassian tools, containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), or IT governance frameworks.

**About us**
------------


With more than 50 years of experience in parking services and pioneering knowledge in car sharing, we are shaping the future of mobility. We are building comprehensive charging infrastructure for electric cars, creating efficient mobility hubs, launching new digital services, and continuously expanding our fleet of electric vehicles.


Our goal is clear: to make life easier for our customers while promoting sustainable mobility. To achieve this, we have created an ecosystem of smart and sustainable solutions – covering everything from parking and car sharing to charging and environmentally friendly mobility hubs.

### **Part of the Sumitomo Group**


Aimo is owned by Sumitomo Corporation – a global investment company and member of the Sumitomo Group. With extensive experience in long-term investments and successful business partnerships, Sumitomo is ranked in the Fortune Global 500. Their ambition is to continuously create new value and contribute positively to society – a vision we share and bring to life every day.

**Location:** Stockholm (Hybrid), we have 4 times a week on-site.  

**Start date:** As soon as possible


Apply today and help us build the future of urban mobility at Aimo.

title: System Developer - Equipment Handling
description:
**About this opportunity**
--------------------------



Ericsson is looking for a skilled System Developer to join our team and drive the development and optimization of next-generation communication systems. This is an opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies that power global networks!  

  

**About us**  

At R&D, CCI Technology & Systems (T&S) we primarily engage with system engineers in the SW domain but also support HW development. Our section contributes to almost all requirement areas (RAs) and programs. We engage in technology strategies and early phases of development, as well as create design and configuration input for RAN, RAN Compute and Site products.  

  

Furthermore, we are a part of:  

  

* make system design for SW features.
* coordinate RAs work via Technical Coordinators.
* technically lead our product development projects.
* set requirement on ASICs for RAN Compute products based on L1 and L2 architecture and performance needs.
* System Simulation and algorithm development.
* Product requirement setting.
 **System Developer – Equipment Handling**  

  

Responsible for supporting hardware maintenance, including installations and replacement of field hardware. Ensure critical functionality to maintain seamless customer operations.  

  

**Key responsibilities:**  

* Bring equipment into operation, supervise performance, and secure continuous availability.
* Support a wide range of hardware units, such as radios and RAN computers, with different capabilities and capacities.
* Manage configurations of varying sizes to meet operational requirements.
* Handle multiple front-haul topology variants for efficient equipment interconnection.
 **Who are you?**  

  

To take on this role you need to have expertise and a strong background in telecommunication and mobile networks. As well as a solid background in the equipment handling (EH) domain. You will drive and take active part in creating our strategies for the equipment handling alongside providing technical leadership, support, and competence development for our researchers in this area (EH).  

With your solution-oriented mindset, you bring a unique mix of qualities to this role. Such as outstanding communication-, craftsmanship-, and leadership skills that enable you to deliver exceptional results and bring people together.

 **Qualifications:**  

* Master’s degree in engineering
* Minimum 5 years’ experience in either System Design, Software Design, RAN, or System Verification, or relevant fields.
* Solid background in telecommunications.
* Proven ability to drive system solutions.
**Following skills are meritorious:**
-------------------------------------



Experience with Unified Modelling Language, Git/Gerrit/PlantUML/Markdown, Netconf/Yang, 3GPP/O-RAN, Managed Object Modelling, Ericsson Corporate Standards, RAN Architecture, and coding skills within C++.  

  

**Why join us?**  

When working with us it's more about the craft as a system developer then knowing all the answers. We believe in the power of collaboration and embrace a team-first mindset to achieve excellence together. Here, you'll grow, share ideas, and build innovations that make a real impact.  

  

**Please note: We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.**

**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Göteborg

title: .NET Fullstack Developer
description:
**Ready for something different? Are you a passionate developer looking for the next challenge in your career? If you would like to combine the benefits of working as a consultant with the benefits of working in a product company, we at Piktiv would like to hear from you!**

##### **Who We Are**


We are a progressive consultancy company that provides smart solutions for our clients. Our work spans from heavy industry systems, healthcare applications, retail and fintech systems, to computer games. We pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and our ability to turn complex challenges into streamlined solutions.


In contrast to many other consultancy companies, Piktiv brings in client projects to work on in-house by providing highly skilled fullstack teams instead of individual consultants. At the moment we are looking to add one more team member to one of our existing clients — a company revolutionising the retail industry by facilitating real-time data sharing between brands and independent retailers.

##### **Who You Are**


You have built a solid foundation in software development through several years of hands-on experience. Your problem-solving approach balances creativity and practicality, ensuring the solutions you develop are both efficient and maintainable. You communicate effectively, making complex technical concepts more accessible to colleagues and stakeholders, which helps drive collaboration and shared understanding.


You take ownership of your work, continuously improving your skills and refining your approach to development. You are eager to grow into a more senior role by deepening your technical expertise and broadening your impact within the team.

##### **What you will do**


Working at Piktiv means being part of a cross functional team consisting of you and your Piktiv colleagues. Together you will tackle the tricky challenges that our clients face.

*Responsibilities*:

* Be involved in every step of the development process, from requirements gathering, design, and implementation to testing, deployment, and operations.
* Actively participate in the development and improvement of our software solutions, bringing your skills and ideas to help shape the project’s progress.
* Work closely with your team members, sharing knowledge and learning from each other. Through collaboration, you contribute to a supportive and skilled development team.

##### **Qualifications**

* At least 4 years of experience working as a software developer out of which 2 years are in .NET and C#
* Strong communication skills in English, both written and verbal
* Willingness to learn and grow as a software developer

##### **Desirable skills**

* Experience with React
* Familiarity with Microsoft Azure

##### **What We Offer**


At Piktiv, we believe in the importance of open communication and creating a collaborative workplace where each individual can thrive. We work hard to cultivate a culture of support and learning with an emphasis on a healthy work-life balance. We offer a competitive salary as well as several perks and benefits. Rather than offer a standardized plan across the company, we like to tailor our offer to your personal preferences in person. The position is full-time, 40 hours per week, on-site in our Skövde office.

title: Backend Developer Intern [Remote]
company_industry: Software Development, IT System Custom Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:

 XR Solutions is a technology-driven company pioneering
 **machine learning-powered augmented reality solutions** 
 for industrial clients.
 



 Our mission is to revolutionize how machines are operated, maintained, and optimized — enabling workflows and innovations that were once impossible. We combine research-based optimizations with cutting-edge AR technology to create
 **practical, reliable, and high-performance solutions** 
 that reshape industries.
 



 This internship offers a rare opportunity to
 **build backend systems that directly power advanced AR applications** 
 used in real-world industrial environments.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We’re looking for a
 **passionate, detail-oriented Backend Developer Intern** 
 with a strong interest in
 **API development, system integration, and backend architecture** 
 .
 



 This is a
 **remote, hands-on role** 
 where you will work closely with experienced developers to design, implement, and maintain backend services that support our AR platforms.
 



 While this is initially
 **unpaid** 
 , exceptional performance may lead to a
 **paid position** 
 after the internship.
 



  





**What You’ll Do:**

 **Node.js** 
 and

 .
* **Database Management** 
 : Work with

 and ORM tools (Sequelize) to design and optimize database schemas.

 : Write and run

 to ensure stability and performance.

 : Learn to work with
